channel.title: Signed up on Patreon for Hangouts Keeper $10 per month — now what?
channel.description:
I'm new to Gauntlet. I would like to RSVP for a few games before they are available to all, which I believe is one of the benefits of the $10/month tier.
How do I know my account at https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com is set up correctly?

item.title: Signed up on Patreon for Hangouts Keeper $10 per month — now what?
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

I’m the person you message about that. I’ll DM you.

Read full topic
item.source: Signed up on Patreon for Hangouts Keeper $10 per month — now what?
